institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 37 (expenditure method)
contents: Article 37 (Disbursement Method) ① The business group must use the support fund with a dedicated card in accordance with Article 22 (4) of the Operation Regulations. However, if any of the following applies, you can input the relevant supporting data into the support fund management system and use the support fund through bank transfer, etc., 1. In the case of expenses paid to individuals, such as meeting allowances, travel expenses, and labor expenses. , 2. If the expenses are paid in cash (simplified tax invoice) within the amount specified in Article 41 (1) 2 of the Enforcement Decree of the Corporate Tax Act due to unavoidable reasons such as small amounts or computer failures, 3. To a significant extent, such as procurement bidding contracts, etc. 4. If the cost is incurred transparently, 4. If the cost is expenditure for facility construction, equipment purchase, etc., where it is deemed reasonable to pay by bank transfer due to excessive fees, etc., and the cost is determined by the steering committee, 5. 6. In the case of expenses incurred through a resolution of the operating committee for services, development, etc., 6. In the case of expenses incurred after the Chairman of the Board of Directors approves that it is appropriate to spend by a method other than a dedicated card among other expenses excluding business promotion expenses, ② The chairman may designate and operate a dedicated credit card company to operate the exclusive card, and must establish and operate a subsidy management system linked to the exclusive card.
